author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is complementary to #27098 (well, at the moment the header->source move is included here as well) to discuss about migration of SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionDepESProducer and SiStripLorentzAngleDepESProducer to EventSetup consumes (as part of #26748).

The challenge in these two classes is that they use the value of `SiStripLatency::singleReadOutMode()` to deduce which of the two (peak, deconvolution) payloads to actually use. This PR has the straightforward approach, i.e. to define 6 ESGetTokens and then decide in produce() which of the 6 possible tokens to use for the get().

But this approach (alone) is not necessarily what we want, as naively it would lead the framework to load both payloads in prefetching (or those that are available in the GlobalTag, by quick look both are in the run2 offline reco GT).

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, no changes expected.
title: [RFC] Migrate SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionDepESProducer and SiStripLorentzAngleDepESProducer to EventSetup consumes
